DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy safety nifedipine compare atosiban treat preterm labor .
DOC.brief_title: Nifedipine Compared Atosiban Treating Preterm Labor
DOC.criteria: 1 . Gestational age 24 34 week document definite LMP sonography 20 week . 2 . All woman fulfil criterion preterm labor . The diagnosis preterm labor require presence 4 uterine contraction 30 minute , last least 30 second , document cervical change . The cervical criterion meet either follow present : 1 . Nulliparous woman : single cervical examination demonstrate dilatation 0 cm 4 cm effacement least 50 % 2 . Multiparous woman : single cervical examination demonstrate dilatation 1 cm 4 cm effacement least 50 % . 3 . Provision write informed consent 1 . Chorioamnionitis 2 . Preterm rupture membranes 3 . Vaginal bleeding 4 . Major fetal malformation 5 . Severe hypertensive disorder 6 . Intrauterine growth restriction ( < 5th percentile ) . 7 . Nonreassuring fetal heart rate 8 . Maternal contraindication 1 . Chronic hypertension 2 . Systolic blood pressure < 90 mmHg 3 . Cardiovascular disease 4 . Elevated hepatic enzyme 9 . Congenital acquire uterine malformation
